doc.description: Compile files into single files, using javascript to call CSS when needed.

name: bbn\Cdn\Compiler

minify.name: minify
minify.summary: Minify the given string in the given lang (js or css).

arguments.name: lang
arguments.description: The language used by the string

doc.description: Minify the given string in the given lang (js or css).

params.name: $lang
params.description: The language used by the string

minify.comments:
/**
   * Minify the given string in the given lang (js or css).
   *
   * @param string $st   The string to minify
   * @param string $lang The language used by the string
   * @return void
   */

getContent.name: getContent
getContent.summary: Returns the content of a file or a group of files,
getContent.description: after having compiled it if needed, and minified if test is false.

description_parts.content: after having compiled it if needed, and minified if test is false.

arguments.name: file
arguments.description: The file or list of files

arguments.name: test
arguments.description: If true the content will not be minified

doc.description:
Returns the content of a file or a group of files,
after having compiled it if needed, and minified if test is false.

params.name: $file
params.description: The file or list of files

params.name: $test
params.description: If true the content will not be minified

getContent.comments:
/**
   * Returns the content of a file or a group of files,
   * after having compiled it if needed, and minified if test is false.
   *
   * @param string|array $file The file or list of files
   * @param boolean      $test If true the content will not be minified
   * @return void
   */

jsLinks.name: jsLinks
jsLinks.summary: Returns a javascript string invoking other javascript files.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: A list of files to be invoked

arguments.name: test
arguments.description: If true minification will not be applied

doc.description: Returns a javascript string invoking other javascript files.

params.name: $files
params.description: A list of files to be invoked

params.name: $test
params.description: If true minification will not be applied

jsLinks.comments:
/**
   * Returns a javascript string invoking other javascript files.
   *
   * @param array   $files A list of files to be invoked
   * @param boolean $test  If true minification will not be applied
   * @return string
   */

hasLinks.name: hasLinks
hasLinks.summary: Returns true if the given css code contains url parameters.

doc.description: Returns true if the given css code contains url parameters.

hasLinks.comments:
/**
   * Returns true if the given css code contains url parameters.
   *
   * @param [type] $css
   * @return boolean
   */

cssLinks.name: cssLinks
cssLinks.summary: Returns a javascript string including css files.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: A list of files to be included

arguments.name: test
arguments.description: If true minification will not be applied

doc.description: Returns a javascript string including css files.

params.name: $files
params.description: A list of files to be included

params.name: $test
params.description: If true minification will not be applied

cssLinks.comments:
/**
   * Returns a javascript string including css files.
   *
   * @param array   $files A list of files to be included
   * @param boolean $test  If true minification will not be applied
   * @return string
   */

cssContent.name: cssContent
cssContent.summary: Returns a string with javascript including the given CSS content in the head of the document.

doc.description: Returns a string with javascript including the given CSS content in the head of the document.

cssContent.comments:
/**
   * Returns a string with javascript including the given CSS content in the head of the document.
   *
   * @param string $css A CSS string
   * @return string
   */

compile.name: compile
compile.summary: Returns an array of compiled codes based on a list of files.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: A list of files to add

arguments.name: test
arguments.description: If true files will not be minified

doc.description: Returns an array of compiled codes based on a list of files.

params.name: $files
params.description: A list of files to add

params.name: $test
params.description: If true files will not be minified

compile.comments:
/**
   * Returns an array of compiled codes based on a list of files.
   *
   * @param array   $files A list of files to add
   * @param boolean $test  If true files will not be minified
   * @return array
   */

groupCompile.name: groupCompile
groupCompile.summary: Compiles together a group of files and returns the result as an array.

arguments.name: files
arguments.description: A list of files to add

arguments.name: test
arguments.description: If true files will not be minified

doc.description: Compiles together a group of files and returns the result as an array.

params.name: $files
params.description: A list of files to add

params.name: $test
params.description: If true files will not be minified

groupCompile.comments:
/**
   * Compiles together a group of files and returns the result as an array.
   *
   * @param array   $files A list of files to add
   * @param boolean $test  If true files will not be minified
   * @return array
   */
